How to Use the Client Log Page

Follow these simple steps to log your entry and exit using the Client Log system.

Process Flow

1 Start the Camera: Click the Start Camera button to activate your device's camera.
2 Scan Your Face: Position your face within the camera view and ensure good lighting for accurate recognition.
3 Verify Identification: Wait for the system to identify you. Check that your name appears correctly in the "Match" section. If incorrect, use the Override button to manually search for your record.
4 Select Purpose(s): Choose one or more purposes for your visit from the checkboxes provided.
5 Additional Details: Provide specific details such as the document name or the person you are visiting when prompted.
6 Click "Time In": Press the Time In button to record your entry. You will hear a success sound and see a confirmation.
7 Log Out When Leaving: When your visit is complete, find your name in the "Active Client/s" section and click Logout.
Everything Set! Your visit will be successfully recorded in our digital logbook.

Pro Tips

Ensure your face is clearly visible and well-lit for faster recognition.
Use the "Override" feature if the camera has trouble identifying you.
Required fields are marked with an asterisk (*).
Only active check-ins can be logged out from the dashboard.
